name: Face your Demons – The First Fifty
description:
This edition features a composition including small versions of the first 50 demon portraits minted on Hic Et Nunc.

Collect this edition as a reference to all 50, and to see how the demons you collected fit into the bigger picture as more demons are released.

-----

Face Your Demons is a unique art collection based on depictions of evil in cultures around the world.

The collection is made up of colorful grotesque demon portraits that are generated by combining hundreds of unique elements, colors, patterns and randomly generated designs created by the artist.

The demons are not meant to represent evil, but rather are intended to ward off evil like gargoyles on a cathedral.

Collect these portraits as a reminder that you have the power to overcome your personal demons no matter how many or how frightening they might be.
